overview: The story of the late Ustadz Al-Jeffri Buchori aka Uje, also known as sociable Ustad. Young Uje drift in the pleasures of the world. He wastes his talents: talented actor, famous model, even a future. Because of his behavior, he is shunned by friends and companions. Even the hope of a mother who wants her children not to waste life, must surrender to face reality.  Acquainted with a girl named , his life. He is so impressed after the first glance. also believe that the man she loves has a determination to change his life. not only to witness the of life, but also to save Uje from drugs.
title: Hijrah Cinta
